'''Portal of Marvels''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to play the Rhythm of the Great Dream in front of the strange stone during [[The World of Aranara]], as part of the [[Aranyaka]] World Quest Series.
